title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Understanding Linear Equations Using Algebra Tiles and Balancing Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent first-degree linear equations using algebra tiles and the balancing method.
Learners can logically explain the process of deriving unknown values by manipulating algebra tiles.
Learners can solve equations without physical tiles by applying the principles of the balancing method.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
